PSSI: Alfin Lestaluhu Meninggal karena Encephalitis
01 Nov 2019, 09:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI akhirnya angkat bicara mengenai penyebab wafatnya Alfin Lestaluhu. Pemain timnas Indonesia U-16 tersebut didiagnosa oleh dokter mengalami encephalitis (infeksi otak) dengan hypoalbumin.
Alfin Lestaluhu mengeluh sakit setelah membela timnas Indonesia U-16 di ajang Kualfikasi Piala Asia 2020. Sempat dirawat di Ambon, Alfin akhirnya dibawa ke Jakarta untuk mendapat perawatan yang lebih intensif.
Namun takdir berkata lain. Alfin Lestaluhu menghembuskan napas terakhir pada Kamis malam sekitar pukul 22.11 WIB di Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita Jakarta.
“Keluarga besar PSSI mendoakan yang terbaik untuk Alfin dan keluarga. Kita sangat kehilangan. Terima kasih atas sumbangsih Alfin untuk tim nasional Indonesia,” kata Sekretaris Jenderal PSSI, Ratu Tisha Destira, di situs resmi PSSI.
Di situs tersebut, PSSI juga telah mendapatkan informasi penyebab meninggalnya Alfin Lestaluhu dari hasil diagnosis dokter. Pemain asal Tulehu tersebut mengalami infeksi otak dengan hypoalbumin.
Encephalitis adalah peradangan atau infeksi (inflamasi) pada otak. Walaupun proses inflamasi ini paling sering disebabkan masuknya virus, namun dapat juga diakibatkan bakteri, jamur atau parasit yang menyerang otak.
Paparan bahan kimia atau reaksi autoimun juga dapat menyebabkan encephalitis.

PSSI: Alfin Lestaluhu died of encephalitis
Nov 01 2019, 09:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI finally spoke about the cause of Alfin Lestaluhu's death. The Indonesian U-16 national team player was diagnosed by a doctor having encephalitis (a brain infection) with hypoalbumin.
Alfin Lestaluhu complained of illness after defending the Indonesian U-16 national team at the 2020 Asian Cup Qualification event. While being treated in Ambon, Alfin was finally taken to Jakarta to receive more intensive care.
But fate said otherwise. Alfin Lestaluhu breathed his last on Thursday night at around 22.11 WIB at the Harapan Kita Hospital in Jakarta.
"The PSSI extended family wishes the best for Alfin and his family. We are very lost. Thank you for Alfin's contribution to the Indonesian national team, "said PSSI Secretary General, Ratu Tisha Destira, on the PSSI official website.
On the site, PSSI has also obtained information on the cause of the death of Alfin Lestaluhu from the doctor's diagnosis. The player from Tulehu had a brain infection with hypoalbumin.
Encephalitis is inflammation or infection (inflammation) in the brain. Although this inflammatory process is most often caused by an influx of viruses, it can also be caused by bacteria, fungi or parasites that attack the brain.
Exposure to chemicals or autoimmune reactions can also cause encephalitis.
